body:
Thanks to all of your support, I finally reached my goal of gaining one hundred subscribers before 2014 ends. To me this is a huge milestone, since I've never been really popular on anything social-related.

To celebrate this, I'm going to be doing a video answering all of your questions asked here. Croc's video actually inspired me to do this, so a huge shoutout to him.

Feel free to ask questions both here, or comment on any of my videos and I'll collect all the questions. I'd like to collect a decent amount of questions before making the video, to make it a reasonable duration.

So yeah, AMA :D

title: 100 Subs - AMA
